What nearness, then, to God there is in doing our appointed work. It is for the glory of God that souls are saved and not left to perish. They 


                                   -279- 

are ransomed by the life, sufferings, and death of the Son of God. "God so loved the world that He gave His only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in Him should not perish, but have everlasting life" [John 3:16].
